tr.td: B/L Knee tenderness with gradation and position

t.t-value: { 'before_food': 'Before Food', 'after_food': 'After Food', 'at_night_time': 'At Night Time', '10am_6pm': '10 am - 6 pm', 'local_application': 'Local Application', 'along_with_milk': 'Along With Milk', 'along_with_milk_rock_sugar': 'Along With Milk + Rock Sugar', 'along_with_lukewarm_water': 'Along With Lukewarm Water', '8am_5pm': '8 am - 5 pm' }

tr.td: Doubtful Joint space narrowing and possible osteophytic lipping.
Definite osteophytes and possible joint space narrowing.
Moderate multiple osteophytes, definite narrowing of joint space and some sclerosis and possible deformity of bone ends.
Large osteophytes, marked narrowing of joint space, severe sclerosis and definite deformity of bone ends.

t.t-if: att['s3_url'] and ('.jpg' in att['s3_url'] or '.jpeg' in att['s3_url'] or '.png' in att['s3_url'])
